alert.note: Alert for Canon City Vicinity, Eastern Fremont County; Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft; Northwestern Fremont County Above 8500Ft; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet; Western, Central Fremont County Below 8500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 23 at 7:31AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Light to Moderate Snow This Morning... Light to moderate snow is expected through mid to late morning along portions of the I-25 corridor from around Monument south to Pueblo, as well as along Highway 50 from Pueblo to Canon City. Under the heaviest snow, visibility will likely fall to just under one mile with slippery conditions likely developing. Those traveling across these areas should use caution, and be prepared for hazardous travel.
